title: Art Everywhere
description:
This summer, images of great American art were displayed as part of “the largest outdoor art show ever conceived.” The 58 artworks that comprise the Art Everywhere US campaign were displayed from coast-to-coast throughout August 2014.

Art Everywhere continues to be a global movement as Art Everywhere UK returned with different works this summer.
short_description: Vote today for your favorite American artworks and see the results displayed on 50,000 billboards and signs across the country beginning August 4, 2014.
